p: The dosing details are also given in Table 1. The volume of oral (p.o.) and intraperitoneal (i.p.) administrations was 1 mL/100 g b.w of mice. The treatments were continued for 8 days. In the behavioural Y-maze and Novel object recognition tests, scopolamine (1â€‰mg/kg, i.p.) was given to these groups only on day 8th, and according to the standard procedure, 1 h after the administration of drugs all the animals were subjected to Y-maze and Novel object recognition test.
